meta.Summary:: MAIB Report on three investigations of fatalities resulting from manoverboard accidents from the fishing vessels Korenbloem, Osprey III and Optik in November 2009. Report No 6/2010. Published 19 May 2010.

title: Triple Investigation Report - Korenbloem, Osprey III, Optik
raw_html:
This report contains details of the investigations into the fatal manoverboard accidents on fishing vessels Korenbloem,Osprey III and Optik .
It has been decided to combine the results of each investigation to produce a single report to better illustrate MAIB concern over safety in this important sector of the UK's fishing industry.

Synopses (400.55 kb)

Report name:
Trilogy
Category:
Fishing vessels
Summary:
MAIB Report on three investigations of fatalities resulting from manoverboard accidents from the fishing vessels Korenbloem, Osprey III and Optik in November 2009. Report No 6/2010. Published 19 May 2010.

Annexes (1,742.44 kb)

An Accident flyer was also produced for these accidents and can be viewed on this website:
Flyer to the Fishing Industry
body:
This report contains details of the investigations into the fatal manoverboard accidents on fishing vessels Korenbloem,Osprey III and  Optik .

It has been decided to combine the results of each investigation to produce a single report to better illustrate MAIB concern over safety in this important sector of the UK's fishing industry.

[Synopses](http://maib.gov.uk/cms_resources/Trilogy%5F2010%5FSynopses%2Epdf) (400.55 kb)

  
MAIB Report on three investigations of fatalities resulting from manoverboard accidents from the fishing vessels Korenbloem, Osprey III and Optik in November 2009. Report No 6/2010. Published 19 May 2010.
